name: rmsd
description: calculate the RMSD of a reference small molecule and a docked small molecule using openbabel.
arguments: echo -n '{reference: $(inputs.reference_structure.basename), comparison: $(inputs.comparison_structure.basename), RMSD: ' && obrms -firstonly $(inputs.reference_structure.filepath) $(inputs.comparison_structure.filepath) | awk '{print $2}' | tr -d '\n' && echo -n '}' > /outputs/rmsd.jsonl
